name: applicable
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: affecting or relating to a person or thing

example.eg: This part of the law is only applicable to companies employing more than five people.
example.egtrans: 该法律这一部分条款仅适用于有5名以上雇员的公司。

example.eg: The new qualifications are applicable to all European countries.
example.egtrans: 新的限定性条件适用于所有欧洲国家。
